snippet.title: Extremely Realistic Siege Warfare Simulator - Steam - Official Game Trailer
snippet.description:
Extremely Realistic Siege Warfare Simulator is a physics-based tactics RPG game which you leading your own force in fantasy medieval world. Build your army and siege equipments. Experience epic siege battles. Lead your people revolting the tyrant!

Steam Store : https://store.steampowered.com/app/1222210/?curator_clanid=7976387
Multiplayer Info : https://playco-opgame.com/extremely-realistic-siege-warfare-simulator/
